H0.text: The word barber - meaning a men's/boy's hairdresser - is from Latin meaning. Hair

H1.text: The word barber - meaning a men's/boy's hairdresser - is from Latin meaning. Razor

H2.text: The word barber - meaning a men's/boy's hairdresser - is from Latin meaning. Style

H3.text: The word barber - meaning a men's/boy's hairdresser - is from Latin meaning. Beard

A4.text: Pliny tells us that P. Ticinius was the first who brought a barber to Rome, which was in the 454th year from the founding of the city (that is, around 299 BCE).
